label: 布袴
説明文: Courtier outfit with a wide-legged, two-layered set of trousers and drawstring hems, referred to as sashinuki trousers.  Like the nōshi, this outfit included an outer robe, or hō.  When worn at court, an under-robe with a lengthier train, referred to as a shitagasane, was added to the ensemble. [指貫、直衣、袍、下襲]
